name: HibVaccine(4DoseSchedule)
title: Hib Vaccine (4 dose schedule)
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent haemophilus influenzae type b (Hib) vaccines (4-dose schedule).),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Immunization, Administered.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with haemophilus influenzae type b (Hib) vaccine codes (4-dose schedule). This is a grouping of CVX codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: diphtheria, tetanus toxoids and acellular pertussis vaccine, Haemophilus influenzae type b conjugate, and poliovirus vaccine, inactivated (DTaP-Hib-IPV)
Meningococcal Groups C and Y and Haemophilus b Tetanus Toxoid Conjugate Vaccine

DTaP-Haemophilus influenzae type b conjugate vaccine
